events.message: I would like to request a refund for the shoes I purchased last week because they do not fit as expected and the size was incorrect.
The customer issue has been identified as a refund request concerning incorrect sizing.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. to assist the customer with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'm here to help you with the refund process for your shoes.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the shoes have been used or if they are still in original condition?
My order number is 1245789. The shoes are unused and in their original box, so they are in perfect condition for a return.
Thank you for the info. I have initiated the refund process and you will receive a prepaid shipping label via email to return the shoes.
Thanks for handling this so quickly! I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the shoes back by tomorrow.
The refund case is now closed on our end. Once we receive the returned shoes, we will process your refund immediately.
Hello! Just following up to confirm that we have received your return and your refund has been issued. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your cooperation, and we hope to serve you again soon.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback on this refund experience. Your input helps us improve.
